name: ChocolateStacks
description:
Made for game jam Krassjam.

Using Chocolate candies create a tower tall enough to reach the bar.

Theme:A  game where you drag and drop chocolate to reach the high score.

Minus the high score part since I ran out of time.

Changes:

I decided to add the  fading level text after the jam since I had them already set and just didn't have time during. Also fixed a spelling mistake.
